title.narrative: HEALTH AND NUTRITION

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Infant And Young Child Feeding, Maternal And Newborn Health, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019 children 0-5 years old, especially the 1.6 million living in extreme poverty, have their rights to survival, development, protection and participation guaranteed through comprehensive early child development policies, and children 6-11 years old have equitable access to quality primary school, with special attention to indigenous girls and boys.

mailing-address.narrative: Paseo de la Reforma 645 Col. Lomas de Chapultepec México D.F. 11000

sector.narrative: Breastfeeding protection, promotion and support (including work on Code)
Prevention of overweight and obesity in early childhood (children under 5)
Technical assistance - Adolescent health and nutrition

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: New Element

description.narrative: Prevention of all forms of malnutrition, with a focus on child overweight and obesity was the focus for UNICEF in 2019. UNICEF worked on evidence-generation, advocacy and policy dialogue in diverse issues ranging from front of pack nutrition labelling to schools as enabling environments for prevention of overweight and obesity. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

title.narrative: Carencia por acceso a la alimentacion en la poblacion menor de 18 a?os.(27520)

baseline.value: 28.2% (11.1 millones de personas) de la poblacion menor de 18 a?os.

target.value: 2019:22% de la poblacion menor de 18 a?os en 2018.

title.narrative: Policy for home visits of new borns is developed and/or revised, adopted and in use

actual.value: 2018:The final report (Evaluacion de impacto del proyecto piloto: “Cuidando al recien nacido y a la madre en casa en comunidades de la sierra de Zongolica, Veracruz) was finalized. Meetings with the new health authorities were requested to present the results

title.narrative: Estrategia implementada para prevenir la malnutricion (desnutricion/obesidad) en poblacion vulnerable, menor de 5 a?os.(63555)

target.value: 2019:Existe una estrategia implementada para prevenir la malnutricion (desnutricion/obesidad) en poblacion vulnerable, menor de 5 a?os.

actual.value: 2020:El gobierno actual no cuenta con una estrategia concreta para la prevencion de la malnutricion para la poblacion menor de 5 a?os. Sin embargo se esta avanzando con medidas amplias para la prevencion del sobrepeso y obesidad como la adopcion de un etiqueta
